name: Elemental Magic (Frostack Games)
description:
FREE DEMO GAME

Save the Goddess Fairy at the end of the enchanted forest using the four elemental fairies whilst defeating enemies and obstacles on the way

Characters:

Clef - Ice type, Melee attack

Chord - Earth type, Melee attack

Melody - Water type, Ranged attack

Harmony - Fire type, Ranged attack

Enemies:

Pay attention to its element on top of its head to fight efficiently

Evil Fairy - Ranged attack

Angry Bird - Melee attack

Combat:

Fire > Ice

Water > Fire

Ice > Water
